comments.content: i agree. where'd you find it?
it's on a shirt, they want another one and want it to match the ones they have. It has a lot of writing on it, I just cropped one word.

It is called Sand from Apple  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/apple/sand/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014023316/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/apple/sand/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/apple/sand/")

from web search: The Apple fonts Gadget, New York, Techno and Sand are only supplied with Mac OS and are not currently available for retail.
